name: Chinoiserie | Hand Painted Shoe
description: This Hand painted "Chinese-esque" pair of shoes will surely brighten up your wardrobe. This pair is greatly influenced by orientalism, it tells a story of the beautiful Mudan flower flowing down the river bed.
